metadata.name: Powershell Executed From Headless ConHost Process
metadata.comment: Detects the use of powershell commands from headless ConHost window. The "--headless" flag hides the windows from the user upon execution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\conhost.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('conhost.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--headless')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')))

output.summary: Detects the use of powershell commands from headless ConHost window. The "--headless" flag hides the windows from the user upon execution.
